name: Tinfoil Security, Inc.
description: Developer of website and application programming interface (API) security software designed to make website and mobile security accessible to the world. The company's web application scanner checks website vulnerabilities using automated scan checks and tracks external hackers picking through each access point on the website, enabling developers to identify how to fix vulnerable areas before they get hacked.
one_liner: Developer of website and application programming interface (API) security software designed to make website and mobile security accessible to the world. The company's web application scanner checks website vulnerabilities using automated scan checks and tracks external hackers picking through each access point on the website, enabling developers to identify how to fix vulnerable areas before they get hacked.
